name: DRBibleVerses
0:
”Alexa, open D. R. Bible verses”
”read 1 Peter chapter 3 verses 5 through 10”
”tell me a random verse”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: d. r. bible verses
des: Have Alexa read from the reknowned Douay-Rheims Bible, or "D R Bible" for ease of invocation. Simply ask for a book name (such as Genesis), a chapter number, and the verse or verse range (ie. 1 to 10) that you would like to hear. Very handy study tool!
